title: How do I examine files on my SD card?
answer:
Method 1：Main menu->File manager；Use a file manager application to examine content on your SD card.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150429154408154001.png)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150429154409784002.png)

Method 2：Main menuàsettingàstorage

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150429154409823003.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150429154409330004.jpg)
